header.title: sets

description.p: Sets are collections of elements with no duplicate elements. The representation of a set is not defined.

This module provides exactly the same interface as the module ordsets but with a defined representation. One difference is that while this module considers two elements as different if they do not match (=:=), ordsets considers two elements as different if and only if they do not compare equal (==).

desc.p: Returns true if Set is a set of elements, otherwise false.

func.name: size(Set) -> int()
func.fsummary: Return the number of elements in a set

desc.p: Returns the number of elements in Set.
Returns the elements of Set as a list.

func.name: from_list(List) -> Set
func.fsummary: Convert a list into an Set

desc.p: Returns an set of the elements in List.

func.name: is_element(Element, Set) -> bool()
func.fsummary: Test for membership of an Set

desc.p: Returns true if Element is an element of Set, otherwise false.

func.name: add_element(Element, Set1) -> Set2
func.fsummary: Add an element to an Set

desc.p: Returns a new set formed from Set1 with Element inserted.

func.name: del_element(Element, Set1) -> Set2
func.fsummary: Remove an element from an Set

desc.p: Returns Set1, but with Element removed.

func.name: union(Set1, Set2) -> Set3
func.fsummary: Return the union of two Sets

desc.p: Returns the merged (union) set of Set1 and Set2.

func.name: union(SetList) -> Set
func.fsummary: Return the union of a list of Sets

desc.p: Returns the merged (union) set of the list of sets.

func.name: intersection(Set1, Set2) -> Set3
func.fsummary: Return the intersection of two Sets

desc.p: Returns the intersection of Set1 and Set2.

func.name: intersection(SetList) -> Set
func.fsummary: Return the intersection of a list of Sets

desc.p: Returns the intersection of the non-empty list of sets.

func.name: is_disjoint(Set1, Set2) -> bool()
func.fsummary: Check whether two Sets are disjoint

desc.p: Returns true if Set1 and Set2 are disjoint (have no elements in common), and false otherwise.

func.name: subtract(Set1, Set2) -> Set3
func.fsummary: Return the difference of two Sets

desc.p: Returns only the elements of Set1 which are not also elements of Set2.
Returns true when every element of Set1 is also a member of Set2, otherwise false.
